General.Name: Sakura Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Sakura Development Co.,Ltd engages in the sale and lease of residential properties with focus on the Zhongzhangtou area in Taiwan. The company was founded in 1976 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

1.Name: Ms. Shu-Chen  Shen
1.Title: Mang. of Fin. Department, Accounting Supervisor, Financial Accounting Mang. & Director
